_header: My prince in God give thee good grace
Title(s): A New Year’s Gift to the King
Subjects: occasional verse; James IV, king of Scotland
_description: A New Year’s Gift to the King, by William Dunbar — five quatrains

CULLl510.First Lines:
My prince in god gif þe guid graceIoy glaidnes confort and
                    solace…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…Hie Liberall hert & handis not sweirIn hansell of
                    þis guid new ȝeir
